text: Merrill Anthony "Tony" McPeak (born January 9, 1936) is a retired 4-star general in the United States Air Force. His final assignment before retirement was as the 14th Chief of Staff of the Air Force from 1990 to 1994. In 1993, McPeak served as Acting Secretary of the Air Force, before Sheila E. Widnall was appointed by President Bill Clinton. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official USAF Biography * Official website of General McPeak's Aerial View Trilogy Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of the Air Force Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Military people from Oregon Category:Military people from California
title: Merrill McPeak
